full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, BTZAN MDOS GTONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR GYI LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B BTZAN MDOS GTONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR GYI LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG DUR BED NAS DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA NANG SO SKAL BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS AU TSUGS MTHAR SKYEL GYIS BSKUL BA'I GA-YANG NGO MA BZLOG PAR, LHA 'DRE STONG GI DRA BA LAS 'PHYUNG BA DANG SGO BSTUN TE KU S'A LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS NOR SKYOD 'BABS PA @008A *, ,RGAL TSUL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI GU SHRI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS BGYIS PA RIS MED YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SVA STI, TSUL 'DI DGE SLONG THABS MKHAS RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SDE BDE CHEN LHUN GRUB GLING MCHOG TU, ,RGYU RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BZHENGS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,(CES SH'A SA DHA RAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
